"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4124b118-e8c8-449a-2ae8-722ac6f85433#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Újasszír sztélék, obeliszkek</string>
            <string language="en">new assyrian steles, obelisks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">neue assyrian Steles, Obelisks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nouveaux steles assyriens, obélisques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">steles assyrian novos, obelisks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nuovi steles assyrian, obelisks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νέα assyrian steles, οβελίσκοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">steles asirios nuevos, obeliscos</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az újasszír sztélék és obeliszkek témáinak, ábrázolásmódjának és stílusának bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">presentation of themes rendering stlye of new assyrian steles, obelisks</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">asszír,  dombormű,  sztélé,  obeliszk,  </string>
            <string language="en">assyrian, embossment, stele, needle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der Themen, die stlye der neuen 
assyrian Steles, Obelisks übertragen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présentation des thèmes rendant le stlye de 
nouveaux steles assyriens, obélisques</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresentação dos temas que rendem o stlye dos 
steles assyrian novos, obelisks</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presentazione dei temi che rendono stlye di nuovi
steles assyrian, obelisks</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσίαση των θεμάτων που δίνουν stlye των νέων 
assyrian steles, οβελίσκοι</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presentación de los temas que rinden el stlye de
los steles asirios nuevos, obeliscos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Assyrian, Prägung, Stele, Nadel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Assyrien, foulage, stele, aiguille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">assyrian, embossment, stele, agulha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">assyrian, embossment, stele, ago</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">assyrian, embossment, stele, βελόνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">asirio, repujado, stele, aguja</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          <learningResourceType>

        <rights>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

        <metaMetadata>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
